product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Persian Peach Stew with Chicken
long_description: Backpacker's Pantry Persian Peach Stew with Chicken is a tasty blend of savory and sweet to end a long day on the trail. Open the separate packet of organic extra-virgin olive oil, and add the oil to the other ingredients in the bag. Add 2 cups of boiling water and stir well; seal bag and let sit for 13 minutes, then stir and serve. Directions are for up to 5,000 ft. elevation; rehydration time doubles every additional 5,000 ft. of elevation. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Backpacker's Pantry Persian Peach Stew with Chicken is a tasty blend of savory and sweet to end a long day on the trail.
